title: (x) Yet more type in my head... - Luggage {James}
content:
There's a point where I think I should just design my own type - why not?? Probably because I wouldnt be very good at it!   
   
 ![ruff2](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526122137im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36462.jpg)   
   
   
mmmm sheared... ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526122137im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
   
   
James
author: jcarruthers

comments.content:
Cheers James... that's a good one!   
   
I should say - typefaces along this theme are what I'm looking ford - it doesnt have to be exact... if the Y is different etc... thats ok...   
   
   
James

No way. I won't let you get away with it. After saying you want to design your own type, don't quit! The letterforms you have chosen are nice and straight forward.You can do it.   
   
The first thing to do is block in the letters. Your sample is made entirely out of rectangles. The part that will require some consideration is making optical thickness adjustments. 6 letters. All caps. It's a great place to start! Post some refinements. The good people at typophile will walk you through it.   
   
Randy

Yes Sir!   
   
Hmmm... I like a challenge... I'll work out my basic grid right away...   
   
   
James
I think I'll transplant this thread over to the design forum...
